text.text_translated:
Online places help people.
They can get money quickly.
For example, busy parents.
Before, they did not want to sell their children's old equipment.
It was too much work for them.
They did not want to go to a market.
They did not want to sell things at a car boot sale.
Now, online places make it easy.
Parents can sell baby clothes that are almost new.
Their children cannot wear them now.
They can also sell expensive pushchairs.
They can sell other baby equipment.
They spent a lot of money on these things.
So, they can get some cash back.

feedback.feedback: PASS: All diagnostic checks passed. The text maintains factual integrity and preserves the core meaning, as evidenced by a MeaningBERT score of 0.8409 and a BERTScore of 0.901. The CEFR classifier accurately rated the text as A2. The vocabulary is appropriate for the A2 level, with no unapproved B1/B2 words detected. Sentence structures are consistently short and simple, and connectors are limited to those suitable for A2 proficiency. This output demonstrates strong adherence to the A2 readability standard.
